publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1241 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees: (a) the following programme of business- Wednesday 25 October 2000 2.30 pm Time for Reflection followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions followed by Executive Debate on Primary Dental Care Services 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business Thursday 26 October 2000 9.30 am Executive Business followed by Business Motion 2.30 pm Question Time 3.10 pm First Minister's Question Time 3.30 pm Executive Debate on the Framework for Economic Development in Scotland followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business - debate on the subject of S1M-1171 Alex Fergusson: Waiver of Groundwater Maintenance Charge and (b) that Stage 2 of the Transport (Scotland) Bill be completed by 22 November 2000 Supported by: Iain Smith*
